Block Ads on Amazon Prime Video with ADvoid

Are you tired of paying for Amazon Prime Video only to be interrupted by ads? ADvoid is your solution! This browser extension effectively blocks the pre-roll ads that appear before movies and shows, allowing you to enjoy your content without interruptions.

How Does ADvoid Work?
Unlike other tools that skip or fast-forward ads, ADvoid mutes both audio and visuals during advertisements, ensuring you don’t have to endure them. It’s not just about saving time; it’s about creating a more enjoyable viewing experience.

Key Features:

Completely avoid pre-roll ads
Easy installation: just install the extension and play your movie
Muting solution for audio and video ads
Enjoy uninterrupted content and reclaim the seamless viewing experience you deserve.

https://blog.june07.com/advoid-install

Disclaimer: ADvoid is not affiliated with Amazon.com, Inc. or Prime Video.
